title: Expand my boundaries
creator_credit: Denise VanWyk, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: When she was given the opportunity to study in Melbourne, Denise VanWyk and her family seized it with both hands. She marvels at her new home, its diversity, acceptance and relaxed atmosphere.
creator_credit_for_label: Denise VanWyk, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
